attributes.action: stop illegal landings on our shores Not promises ACTION NOW
attributes.additional_details: safety of our boarders is paramount  and safety and well being of our nation. we do not know what these peoples intensions are. Infections security risk high terrorism and a strain on our welfare. Tax payers are footing the bill this is not right
attributes.background: Stop all illegal migrants They must be detained we do do not know who or what there intensions are and are a very High security Risk to our country. And safety of our nation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Illegal immigration is already illegal. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
